name: Mountaintop Passage
description:
Mountaintop passage is a climbing sidescroller, in which your goal is to travel from one checkpoint to another as quickly as possible. To make your way through the dangerous mountain environment, you got your grappling hook and your incredibly strong legs. 

Your time is saved in a leaderboard for the chosen route, so you can compete for the number one spot with other players all around the world. 

This game was made in about 4 days for the Extra Credits Jam 5.

Programming & Music: Janis Bögershausen
Art: Lasse Häckl

Character heavily based on rvros's "Animated Pixel Adventurer".
